transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: what are the warranties on my battery

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Battery Smart provides a 12‑month warranty covering any performance or defect issues; if you need a claim, just raise it in the app or visit any swap station.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Open the Battery Smart app, tap Warranty → File Claim, upload a photo of the battery and a brief description, then submit. You can also visit any swap station for immediate assistance.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Claims are reviewed within 24–48 hours, and a replacement battery can be provided at any swap station on the same day.

formatted_transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

Customer: what are the warranties on my battery

Agent: Battery Smart provides a 12‑month warranty covering any performance or defect issues; if you need a claim, just raise it in the app or visit any swap station.

Customer: warranty claim

Agent: Open the Battery Smart app, tap Warranty → File Claim, upload a photo of the battery and a brief description, then submit. You can also visit any swap station for immediate assistance.

Customer: how much time

Agent: Claims are reviewed within 24–48 hours, and a replacement battery can be provided at any swap station on the same day.
